all.description: Every December for the past 27 years, the editors of Popular Science have sought out the products and technologies poised to change our world. The advances can be simpleâ€”say, an unhackable phone or invisible duct tape. Or they can be profound: Imagine bionic arms dexterous enough to use chopsticks. Regardless of their scope, every one of our 100 honorees is nothing short of extraordinary.
